name: Matrid Technologies
tagline: One Stop Source for Dedicated Indian Resources
description: MATRID provides leading-edge software development services, mobile development and web solutions to rapidly transform your company’s ideas and concepts into new products and applications. MATRID’s dedicated team has an impressive track record of developing new technologies, applications, and information systems for clients in a range of industries. MATRID has extensive experience in the development of mobile, desktop, client-server, and web-based applications for enterprise clients.
